channel.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
channel.description: Im pretty sure that visual studios had it and my dad is getting that for free in a couple of weeks, but im pretty impatient lol ;D

item.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:7, topic:112703”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=161103.msg1512180#msg1512180 date=1182201581]
you can make MFC programs in VS which are GUIs
[/quote]

I thought MFC’s were class libraries…[/quote]

an MFC program includes the libs for MFC which are very basic GUIs and i mean basic like windows 98

o and this is for C++
they are very messy programs

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?

item.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:5, topic:112703”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=161103.msg1512140#msg1512140 date=1182200841]
No, no, the only GUI maker is in actual Visual Studio for Visual Basic. Visual J# is just good for a Java/J# IDE.

However, search up on google java gui makers and you should find some nice ones.
[/quote]

You can make J# GUI’s in Visual Studio. I’m using the 2005 Standard edition and I can make J#, C# and VB.NET GUI apps.[/quote]

O.o, I didn’t know that.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

No, no, the only GUI maker is in actual Visual Studio for Visual Basic. Visual J# is just good for a Java/J# IDE.

However, search up on google java gui makers and you should find some nice ones.

item.source: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?

item.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

blah bah7:

Im pretty sure that visual studios had it and my dad is getting that for free in a couple of weeks, but im pretty impatient lol ;D

Wait for Visual Studio, it’s the best GUI developer out there.
Look at the .NET languages, VB, C# and J# are all drag and drop GUI’s, and they are all (or should be) supported by Visual Studio.

(Mysterous Voice) One more reason to make the switch to .NET.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?

item.title: Is there a program, like the visual studio program, that helps you build a GUI?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Not for building a GUI, but there is an awesome Visual J# IDE that works well with Java.

http://msdn.microsoft.com/vstudio/express/visualJ/default.aspx
